projectTitle: Automatic Illumination Control using a Light Dependent Resistor

content.title: Description
content.text: A simulation of an automatic illumination control system modelled with a light-emitting diode (LED) and a light dependent resistor (LDR).

content.title: Materials
text: Intel Galileo Board with the SeeedStudio’s Grove Starter Kit Plus – Intel IoT Edition

content.title: Subject Relation
content.text: We can relate this to the concepts of power consumption and of Ohm’s law in Advanced High School Physics.
